mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_gfix_spec.select */ SELECT stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ ,gfix_dt /* gfix_dt 성장비만지수_일자 character(8) */ ,growfat_div_cd /* growfat_div_cd 성장비만_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ ,mesu_val_1 /* mesu_val_1 측정_값_1 numeric */ ,mesu_val_2 /* mesu_val_2 측정_값_2 numeric */ ,mesu_val_3 /* mesu_val_3 측정_값_3 numeric */ ,판단_근거_cntn /* 판단_근거_cntn 판단_근거_내용 character varying(4000) */ ,certihigh_cntn /* certihigh_cntn 권고_사항 character varying(4000) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ts_gfix_spec WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND gfix_dt = #{gfixDt} /* gfix_dt 성장비만지수_일자 character(8) */ AND growfat_div_cd = #{growfatDivCd} /* growfat_div_cd 성장비만_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_gfix_spec.insert */ INSERT INTO ts_gfix_spec ( stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ ,gfix_dt /* gfix_dt 성장비만지수_일자 character(8) */ ,growfat_div_cd /* growfat_div_cd 성장비만_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */
,mesu_val_1 /* mesu_val_1 측정_값_1 numeric */ ,mesu_val_2 /* mesu_val_2 측정_값_2 numeric */ ,mesu_val_3 /* mesu_val_3 측정_값_3 numeric */
,판단_근거_cntn /* 판단_근거_cntn 판단_근거_내용 character varying(4000) */
,certihigh_cntn /* certihigh_cntn 권고_사항 character varying(4000) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ #{gfixDt} /* gfix_dt 성장비만지수_일자 character(8) */ #{growfatDivCd} /* growfat_div_cd 성장비만_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{mesuVal1} /* mesu_val_1 측정_값_1 numeric */ ,#{mesuVal2} /* mesu_val_2 측정_값_2 numeric */ ,#{mesuVal3} /* mesu_val_3 측정_값_3 numeric */
,#{판단근거Cntn} /* 판단_근거_cntn 판단_근거_내용 character varying(4000) */
,#{certihighCntn} /* certihigh_cntn 권고_사항 character varying(4000) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_gfix_spec.update */ UPDATE ts_gfix_spec
,nutr_cd = #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */
,mesu_val_1 = #{mesuVal1} /* mesu_val_1 측정_값_1 numeric */
,mesu_val_2 = #{mesuVal2} /* mesu_val_2 측정_값_2 numeric */
,mesu_val_3 = #{mesuVal3} /* mesu_val_3 측정_값_3 numeric */
,판단_근거_cntn = #{판단근거Cntn} /* 판단_근거_cntn 판단_근거_내용 character varying(4000) */
,certihigh_cntn = #{certihighCntn} /* certihigh_cntn 권고_사항 character varying(4000) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND gfix_dt = #{gfixDt} /* gfix_dt 성장비만지수_일자 character(8) */ AND growfat_div_cd = #{growfatDivCd} /* growfat_div_cd 성장비만_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
